node.detail_zh: 患者過往健康良好，1 月 19 日與母親、妹妹及弟弟（第 #1069、#1070 及 #1071 宗個案患者）前往巴基斯坦出席第 #1072 宗個案患者的婚禮。5 月 28 日與家人一同返港，由檢疫中心送院，一直沒出現病徵。
node.detail_en: The patient has good past health and travelled to Pakistan along with his mother, younger sister, and younger brother (patients #1069, #1070, and #1071) to attend the wedding ceremony of patient #1072 on January 19. He returned to Hong Kong along with his family on May 28, was hospitalised from quarantine centre, and has developed no symptoms.

node.remarks_zh: 與母親、妹妹及弟弟（第 #1069、#1070 及 #1071 宗個案患者）同行；曾於當地參與第 #1072 宗個案患者的婚禮
node.remarks_en: Travelled with his mother, younger sister and brother (patients no. #1069, #1070 and #1071); attended the wedding banquet of patient no. #1072
